messages.register_required: To use Tecflow you must create an account
messages.login_required: To use Tecflow you must log into your account using one of the options below

document_generation.title: AI-Powered Document Generation
document_generation.subtitle: Transform your ideas into professional technical documentation in seconds
document_generation.sign_in_prompt: Sign in to start saving your chats
document_generation.sign_in_description: Once you're signed in, you can access your recent chats here.
document_generation.empty_preview: Your generated content will appear here
document_generation.document_will_be_generated: Your document will be generated in PDF format
document_generation.additional_info_message: Enter any additional information for your quotation request...

tech_spec.title: Technical Specification
tech_spec.description: Generate detailed technical specifications with structured formatting and clarity.

srs.title: Software Requirement Specification
srs.description: Create comprehensive SRS documents outlining system functionalities and requirements.

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.description: Design and document system architectures with clear diagrams and structured descriptions.

homepage.title: TecFlow Help Center
homepage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team

steps.create_account_desc: Sign up using your email or Google account to access all features.
steps.choose_doc_desc: Select from our templates: Technical Specs, SRS, Architecture Diagrams, or start blank.
steps.input_reqs_desc: Describe your project in natural language or use our guided prompts.
steps.generate_refine_desc: Review the AI-generated document and make any necessary edits.
steps.export_share_desc: Download in your preferred format or share directly with team members.

items.template_library_desc: Access our growing collection of industry-standard templates for various technical documents.
items.ai_suggestions_desc: Get intelligent recommendations for sections, terminology, and formatting as you work.
items.collaboration_desc: Share documents with team members and track changes in real-time.
items.version_history_desc: Access previous versions of your documents and restore if needed.

questions.question: How do I create my first document?
questions.answer: Navigate to the Dashboard and click 'New Document'. Select your document type, enter your requirements, and let TecFlow generate your first draft.

questions.question: What document formats does TecFlow support?
questions.answer: TecFlow currently supports PDF, Word (.docx), and Markdown exports. More formats are coming soon.

questions.question: Is my data secure with TecFlow?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never store your sensitive information. All document processing happens securely in your browser.

questions.question: Can I customize the document templates?
questions.answer: Yes! All templates are fully customizable. After generation, you can edit any section or save your modifications as a new template.

contact.title: Contact Our Support Team
contact.live_chat_location: Click the chat icon in the bottom right
